tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE text_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	text_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE text_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
         text_data TEXT);

CREATE TABLE nlp_tasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
         task_name TEXT);

CREATE TABLE data_mapping (mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
         task_id INT,
         data_id INT,
         FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES nlp_tasks(task_id),
         FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES text_data(id));

CREATE TABLE Sentences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    sentence_number INT,
    sentence_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES Texts (id)
);

CREATE TABLE Words (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentence_id INT,
    word_number INT,
    word_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sentence_id) REFERENCES Sentences (id)
);

CREATE TABLE text_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tokens (
    token_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentences (
    sentence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentence_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE entities (
    entity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_text TEXT,
    entity_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE classifications (
    classification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    classification_label TEXT
)
